card.name: Bronze-Arm Tribe
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Mist Rias, Sonic Guardian
card.text: ■ Whenever another creature is put into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Aqua Surfer
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Cocco Lupia
card.text: ■ Your creatures that have Dragon in their race each cost 2 less to summon. ''(Dragonoids don't count.)'' They can't cost less than 2.

card.name: Energy Stream
card.text: ■ Draw 2 cards.

card.name: Bazagazeal Dragon
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ This creature can attack untapped creatures. ■ Double Breaker ■ End Step

card.name: Skysword, the Savage Vizier
card.text: ■ Multi ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

card.name: Tajimal, Vizier of Aqua
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Multi ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ While battling a fire creature, this creature gets +4000 power.

card.name: Heaven's Gate
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have "blocker" from your hand to the battle zone.

card.name: Bolgress Bazz, Matchless Dragon Machine
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return any number of Dragons from your mana zone to your hand.

card.name: North Grande, Blue Divine Dragon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card.

card.name: Eco Aini
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. If that card is a Dragon, put another card from the top of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Geo Bronze Magic
card.text: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. If that card is a light or fire card, you may draw a card.

card.name: Death Gate, Gate of Hell
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. You may put a non-evolution creature that costs less than the destroyed creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

card.name: DNA Spark
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. ■ If you have 2 shields or less, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

card.name: Aqua Naruto Surfer
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose up to 2 creatures in the battle zone and return them to their owners' hands.

card.name: Zabi Barrel, Western Doll
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards a card from their hand.

card.name: Bone Dance Charger
card.text: ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ Charger

card.name: Mendelssohn
card.text: ■ Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Put all Dragons revealed this way into your mana zone tapped and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Truename Baulion
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return up to 2 spells from your graveyard to your hand. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Mitsurugi Boost, Matchless Dragon Demon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put this creature into your mana zone. If you do, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less.

card.name: Honenbe, Skeletal Guardian
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. If you do, you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Ragnarok, the Clock
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature, skip the rest of the turn.

card.name: Mypad, Start Dash
card.text: ■ Each turn, you may have the first water creature you summon cost 1 less. It can't cost less than 1.

card.name: BloodRayne, Start Dash
card.text: ■ Each turn, you may have the first darkness creature you summon cost 1 less. It can't cost less than 1.

card.name: Dragon's Sign
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put a non-evolution Light dragon creature that costs 7 or less from your hand. That creature gets "blocker" until the start of your next turn.

card.name: Batocross Battle, Passion Dragon
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. This creature and that creature battle. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone during your opponent's turn, put this creature on the bottom of your deck at the End Step

card.name: Bakuadorgan, Passion Dragon
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a Dragon, put it into your hand. If it's not a Dragon, put it on the bottom of your deck.

card.name: Ottakara Atakara
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

card.name: The Red, Lightning Sonic
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker

card.name: Talbot, Sonic
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ This creature attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Liberation of the End
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 9999 or less. ■ Put one of your seals into your graveyard.

card.name: Trooper, Forbidden U
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, put one of your seals from the battle zone into your graveyard.

card.name: Angel Feather
card.text: ■ Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Take a light spell and a light command from the revealed cards and put them into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Generarose, Red Rose Dragon Elemental
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card. Then you may put a non-evolution light creature that costs 6 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

card.name: Dante, Future Ball
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a spell from your mana zone or graveyard to your hand. ■ When this creature would be destroyed, put it on the top of your deck instead.

card.name: Chikichiki JET Circuit
card.text: ■ Each of your creatures gets "speed attacker". ■ ''(Whenever another D2 Field is put into the battle zone, put this D2 Field into your graveyard.)''

card.name: Overkill Graveyard
card.text: ■ Each of your creatures gets "slayer." ''(Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)'' ■ ''(Whenever another D2 Field is put into the battle zone, put this D2 Field into your graveyard.)''

card.name: Houma, Guide Dragon Elemental
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card. Then you may cast a light spell that costs 5 or less from your hand For No Cost

card.name: Dairyugan, Turbulent Colonel
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Revolution Change ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ After this creature attacks, you may discard a fire and nature Dragon from your hand. If you do, untap this creature.

card.name: Konchi, Foxkind
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Rafululu, Sound Faerie
card.text: ■ Revolution Change ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, this turn, your opponent can't cast spells.

card.name: Wonder Tune MOTORS
card.text: ■ Whenever your creatures battle, you may draw 2 cards. If you do, discard a card from your hand, and if that card is a creature, your battling creature gets +5000 power until the end of the battle. ■ ''(Whenever another D2 Field is put into the battle zone, put this D2 Field into your graveyard.)''
